high_descs: Take a left at the fireplace and walk to the small wooden table in the corner next to the chair ahead and to the right side.
Turn on the small lamp on the table.
Pick up the gold statue from the left side of the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a statue by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Walk left across the room to the corner table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
Pick up the gold decoration from the table.
Walk forward until you reach the fireplace, then turn left and walk across the room to the small table that is next to the chair.
Turn the lamp on that is on the small table.
Pick up the gold figurine that is sitting on the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp and pick up a gold figurine.
